reviews.review_msg: Definitely my favourite professor ever. She really knows her stuff and it's clear that she has a genuine interest in the subject matter and wants to make it as interesting as possible for the students. The dinosaur unit was particularly fantastic as she brought in numerous samples (as she did for most lectures).
Hard exams, nice prof, always helps, and encourages you to study hard.

No critical comment on Robbie - she likes to act goofy, but is precise and professional when it comes down to facts.  A tip to succeed in this class with the awful Levin book we use scattered bits of - just highlight the awful thing.  A lot of lecture notes in 2nd half are straight from the book, but scattered.

Robbie is fabulous. When you ask her a question, she talks to you as a person, not an idiot student. There is a lot of specific material to know for this class, but just make the effort, and you'll get the marks to reflect it. Her class was enjoyable to attend. She's extremely understanding about the life of a student as well.
